subject: Good day to you,
body:
Good day to you,
Have you received your fund payment from the HSBC Bank UK? The World Bank president has directed that
your inheritance/contract fund payment should be conduct through a "WAIVER METHOD".
This payment method requires that every necessary charge will be deducted from your total fund of US$17M
and the balance will be send to you either by ATM CARD, bank transfers or any transfer means of your choice.
You can contact your account office in-charge of your payment at the HSBC Bank on his contact details bellow:
Contact Person:    Philip Anderson (Your Account Officer)
Email Address:     (
philipanderson011@aol.com
)
Phone Number:    +4407904619739
If you have received your fund from the HSBC Bank UK or been contacted by the bank, please kindly let us
know immediately for our record purposes.
We are waiting for your urgent confirmation.
Regards.
Mr. Peter Cudrow
Public Relation Department
World Bank Switzerland.

subject: Re:  Good day to you,
body:
Hello Mr. Peter Cudrow,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your update regarding the fund payment from HSBC Bank UK.

Best wishes,
James
